Class Point3D

  • java.lang.Object
    • bigshot.Point2D
      • bigshot.Point3D

  • public class Point3D
extends Point2D
    A 3D point

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      double z
      The z-coordinate.

      • Fields inherited from class bigshot.Point2D

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Point3D()
      Creates a new 3d point with coordinates (0, 0, 0).
      Point3D(double x, double y, double z)
      Creates a new 3d point with the given coordinates.

      Computes the cross product of this vector and another.

      Computes the dot product of this vector and another.
      double norm()
      The euclidean distance of the point to the origin.
      double norm2()
      The square of the euclidean distance of the point to the origin.

      Projects the point by dividing the x and y coordinates by z / f.

      Rotates the point around the X-axis.

      Rotates the point around the Z-axis.

      Scales the point relative to the origin.

      Formats the point on the form [x, y, z].
      void translate3D(double dx, double dy, double dz)
      Translates the point.
      void translateZ(double d)
      Translates the point along the z axis.
